Class ConnectedThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • blueMesh.display.ConnectedThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectedThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class used to send data over sockets obtained by other Bluetooth devices

    schnej7

               RouterThread parent,

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        aHandler - used to send data back to the user
        parent - reference to the parent RouterThread
        ID - the ID of the ConnectedThread assigned by its parent
        socket - the socket use for input and output to another device
